title: A Standard Mentor Meeting
prompt:
Hi there, SAVI here. How are you all doing?

Welcome to this mentor meeting! In this meeting:
- We will review your progress
- We will try and help you get unstuck if need be
- We can talk about some of my experiences and how they might be relevant

If you are ready to get started, please type: `Yes`

title: Welcome & Introductions
prompt:
❗️ **Action:** Enter each team member’s full name

Please type in names, divided by a comma

title: Problem, customer and solution
prompt:
❗️ **Action:** To get started, please type out the problem you are solving, for who are you solving it and what are your thoughts on the solution you want to provide 

(It is always good to practice this and any team member should be able to repeat this in a very similar fashion at any time of asking?

title: Assignment
prompt:
❗️ **Action:** Would you like to share any challenges you are having with any of your assignments, or chat to me about them

 Unfortunately I dont have an upload function yet (watch this space) so we will have to chat with words.

 If you really need a mentor to view the assignment, why not go to the Mashauri ChatGPT (my sister) function as there you can upload and prompt for support (but do try me first, I am super smart!

title: Team Objectives
prompt: ❗️ **Action:** What are the team’s main objectives …

title: Wrap-Up
prompt: Thank you for participating in this mentor meeting! …
